title: Need compressed full League of Legends
body:
Can someone post a whole League of Legends game in compressed mode because for some reasons I can't go on with the client downloading, then saying something in error message, then repeating the same process over and over again. Plus every time I tried re-patching, it starts all over again. Please guys, I wanna play League as much as you do, help me and the others who have this same kind of problem.

Either compressed or something like this
http://forum.lol.garena.ph/showthread.php?334888-LoL-PH-Full-Client-Installer-Direct-Link&s=8b1f95404810f1446342f2c9eef41170

replies.body: The garena client is handled by a different support team and client entirely, so my suggestion would be to hit up their region.  As far as the NA region goes, the installer uses the patching server to grab game files.  You'll want to use the[ official download](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) to install League.  Manually transferring or installing files would result in issues like forcing the patcher to reinstall the client every time you launch it, and only save them temporarily.  Hope that helps clear things up!
